subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: By using spins as strategic showpieces, Yulia Lipnitskaya of Russia, 15, is breathing life into the skill, which is having an identity crisis in a sport dominated by jumps.
snippet: By using spins as strategic showpieces, Yulia Lipnitskaya of Russia, 15, is breathing life into the skill, which is having an identity crisis in a sport dominated by jumps.
